name: Return The Stars
description:
Ludum Dare page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/45/return-the-stars

Title says it all: Return the stars to the empty void in the center.

The only input is mouse movement, no other controls!

First time submitting something for a gamejam. I’ve done jams before but never finished in time. Let me know if you find any bugs.

Requires a browser with OpenGL 2.0 support (Firefox/Chrome). If you have audio issues try the windows download!
